column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron
column3: dɛ
column7: Sɔ ɔbanyin biara nya ahosen ma fie no honam mu gu a
column8: n’ahosen no ntsi no ho nntsew."

column2: "Na iyi nye n’ahoɔfi wɔ n’ahosen no mu: sɛ n’ahosen no fi no honam
column3: anaa n’ahosen ma no honam n’ano siw a
column4: ɔyɛ n’ahoɔfi."

column2: "Mpa biara a nyia ɔwɔ ahosen no da do no
column3: no ho nntsew: na adze biara a ɔko do no no ho nntsew."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔka ne mpa no
column3: nhor ne ntar
column4: na onguar noho wɔ nsu mu
column5: osiandɛ no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na nyia ɔko adze biara a nyia ɔwɔ ahosen no atsena do no
column3: nhor ne ntar
column4: na onguar noho wɔ nsu mu
column5: osiandɛ no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na nyia ɔka nyia ɔwɔ ahosen no no honam no
column3: nhor ne ntar
column4: na onguar noho wɔ nsu mu
column5: na no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na sɛ nyia ɔwɔ ahosen to ntafi gu nyia no ho tsew do a; ɔno ɔnhor ne ntar
column3: na onguar noho wɔ nsu mu
column4: osiandɛ no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na apɔnkɔgua biara a nyia ɔwɔ ahosen no bɛtsena do no
column3: no ho nntsew."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔka adze biara a ɔhyɛ n’ase no
column3: no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir: na nyia ɔsoa dɛm ndzɛmba no nhor ne ntar
column4: na onguar noho wɔ nsu mu
column5: na no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Obiara a nyia ɔwɔ ahosen annhohor ne nsa ho wɔ nsu mu na ɔdze bɛka no no
column3: ɔnhor ne ntar
column4: na onguar noho wɔ nsu mu
column5: osiandɛ no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na dɛtsesɛn a nyia ɔwɔ ahosen no bɛka no
column3: wɔmbɔ no: na dua adze biara dze wɔnhor no wɔ nsu mu."

column2: "Na sɛ nyia ɔwɔ ahosen no wɔtsew no ho fi n’ahosen no mu a
column3: ɔno ɔnkan nda esuon wɔ n’ahofir ntsi
column4: na ɔnhor ne ntar
column5: na onguar no honam wɔ mbasu mu

column2: "Na da a otsia awɔtwe no ɔno noara mfa ntamram ebien
column3: nye mborɔnomamba ebien
column4: na ɔmfa mbra EWURADZE enyim wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no mfa mbɔ afɔr
column3: kor nyɛ bɔn ho afɔr
column4: na kor so nyɛ ɔhyew afɔr; na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma no wɔ EWURADZE enyim wɔ n’ahosen no ntsi."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbanyin bi n’ahoba fi no mu fir a
column3: ɔno onguar no honam nyinara wɔ nsu mu
column4: osiandɛ no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na atar biara
column3: nye nwoma biara a ahoba bogu mu no
column4: wɔmfa nsu nhor
column5: osiandɛ no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Ɔbaa so a ɔbanyin dze ahoba nye no da no
column3: hɔn beenu nyinara nguar hɔnho wɔ nsu mu
column4: osiandɛ hɔn ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbaa nya ahosen
column3: na ahosen yɛ bɔgya fi no honam mu gu a
column4: ɔntsena n’asabu mu nda esuon: na obiara a ɔka no no
column5: no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na adze biara a ɔda do wɔ n’asabu mu no
column3: no ho nntsew
column4: na adze biara so a ɔtsena do no

column2: "Na obiara a ɔka ne mpa no
column3: nhor ne ntar
column4: na onguar noho wɔ nsu mu
column5: osiandɛ no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔka adze biara a ɔtsena do no
column3: nhor ne ntar
column4: na onguar noho wɔ nsu mu
column5: osiandɛ no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔwɔ mpa no do
column3: anaa adze biara a ɔtsena do no do
column4: na sɛ ɔka a
column5: no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbanyin bi nye no da
column3: na n’asabu adze no bi ka no ho a
column4: no ho nntsew araa nda esuon; na mpa biara a ɔda do no so ho nntsew."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbaa nya bɔgya ahosen nda pii a ɔnnyɛ n’asabu aber mu
column3: anaa onya ahosen ma ɔtra n’asabu aber a; n’ahoɔfi ahosen nda no nyinara ɔnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ n’asabu nda no mu tse: no ho nntsew."

column2: "Mpa biara a ɔda do wɔ n’ahosen nda nyinara mu no; ɔnyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ n’asabu mpa tse; na adze biara a ɔtsena do no no ho nntsew
column3: dɛ mbrɛ n’asabu mu ahoɔfi tse."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔka ndzɛmba no no ho nntsew
column3: na ɔnhor ne ntar
column4: na onguar noho wɔ nsu mu
column5: osiandɛ no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Mbom sɛ no ho tsew wɔ n’ahosen ho a
column3: ɔno ɔnkan nda esuon
column4: na n’ekyir no no ho aatsew."

column2: "Na da a otsia awɔtwe no ɔmfa ntamram ebien
column3: anaa mborɔnomamba ebien
column4: mbrɛ ɔsɔfo no

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mfa kor mbɔ bɔn ho afɔr
column3: na kor so mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr; na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma no wɔ EWURADZE enyim wɔ n’ahoɔfi ahosen no ntsi."

column2: "Dɛm na hom mfa nyi Israel mfi hɔn ahoɔfi mu; amma woeennwuwu wɔ hɔn ahoɔfi mu
column3: aber a worukogu me ntamadan a ɔwɔ hɔn mu no ho fi no."

column2: "Iyi nye mbra a ɔwɔ hɔ ma nyia ɔwɔ ahosen
column3: nye nyia ɔwɔ ahoba a fie no mu gu
column4: ma ɔdze gu noho fi;"

column2: "na nyia ɔyar wɔ n’asabu mu
column3: na ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa biara a ɔnye obi a no ho nntsew da no."
